name: Willow
descriptions: Willow is a ghoul who serves as the sentry of Underworld in the year 2277.
Underworld's forward observer, Willow is young and satirical, calling visitors to the Mall "tourists" and inquiring if they have a death wish as they have entered a combat zone.
She claims that she is not harassed by super mutants, who she calls "knuckle draggers," chalking it up to them seeing ghouls as family.

She provides basic information about Underworld, giving directions and pointing out that not many of its inhabitants are hospitable, but if one has caps and is not a "ghoul hater," then the residents are willing to engage in trade.
She can usually be found on the Mall, wandering around just outside the entrance to the Museum of History.
detailed_location: The Mall, close to theMuseum of History's entrance

topics.response_text: Another human with a death wish... Welcome to the Mall, tourist.{Can't believe she's talking to someone who just wandered into a combat zone}

topics.topic_text: Um... Where the hell did you come from?
You're crazy to stand out here! Aren't you afraid of the Super Mutants?
topics.response_text: Those knuckle draggers? Nah. They don't bother us Ghouls. Maybe they see us as kin or something. I dunno. Now, those other assholes...
Come on! Here you are in the Mall of our nation's fine capital, taking in the sights, visiting the monuments!
Yeah, you know. Those humans, like you. Well, maybe not like you, I dunno, but humans all the same.

topics.topic_text: Did you say a city of Ghouls?
topics.response_text: Sure did. Underworld. It's right inside the Museum of History, then through the big skull.
